body: Ive been waiting forever for it, is it coming? :o
body_tagged: Ive been waiting forever for it, is it coming? :o
title: Is Name Change Actually Coming?

replies.body: I think Mojang put Minecraft: Story Mode first :C
replies.body_tagged: I think Mojang put Minecraft: Story Mode first :C

reply_to.body: I think Mojang put Minecraft: Story Mode first :C
reply_to.body_tagged: I think Mojang put Minecraft: Story Mode first :C

replies.body:
I was under the impression that it was coming out with the 1.8 update, but that obviously didn't occur. I don't think name changing is necessary, but some people are obviously keen for it otherwise they wouldn't be doing it!  =)

This post by Mojang explains how a lot of it is going to work if anyone is interested: https://mojang.com/2014/04/minecraft-1-7-6-pre-release/
replies.body_tagged:
I was under the impression that it was coming out with the 1.8 update, but that obviously didn't occur. I don't think name changing is necessary, but some people are obviously keen for it otherwise they wouldn't be doing it!  =)

This post by Mojang explains how a lot of it is going to work if anyone is interested: https://mojang.com/2014/04/minecraft-1-7-6-pre-release/

replies.body:
In the 1.7.9 update notes, Mojang states that "We have pushed out an update that supports name changes, however we will not allow name changes until a future date."

So name changes are already supported but Mojang does not want to release it just yet.

They also link this:https://mojang.com/2014/04/minecraft-1-7-6-pre-release/ 
Which is just a FAQ on the name changes.

replies.body: Thanks everyone, this has been solved. Feel free to lock!
